abstract: 'We work for an organization that is both medieval and modern. By learning some history and organizational theory, you can hopefully walk away with some greater understanding of the complex and interesting place you work.' 
summary: 'Working in a modern American research university can be a mysterious experiences. This presentation is intended to shed light on the fact that our de-centralized decision-making and shared governance, are features and not bugs.'
